name: Abyss (itch) (Michael's Games)
description:
How to play?
  • The main objective is to wonder the maze, while staying away from the creatures within. You will spawn beside a bed, where you will be finding yourself stuck in a loop in your head. You must pull all six lever's to unlock the hidden door.
  • Once the door is found and you have found all 6 levers, you have completed the first mission. Please remember these creatures are nowhere close to friendly.
  • TURN OFF YOUR FLASHLIGHT AND THEY WILL COME, LEAVE IT ON.
  • LISTEN CLOSELY THEY WILL JUMP AT YOU IF YOU DON'T TURN YOUR LIGHT OFF, VERY CONFUSING GAME I KNOW. PLEASE ONCE YOU HEAR THE FEW SOUNDS TURN YOUR LIGHT OFF, ONLY TURN IT ON WHEN AROUND THE CREATURES. THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!
CONTROLS:MovementWSADTurn flashlight off / onLeft-ClickSprintLeft-ShiftPauseEscapePress levers / buttonsE
